title: The Amazing Spider-Man
author: Stan Lee
description: Serie de cómics de superhéroes que presenta a Spider-Man, creado por Stan Lee y Steve Ditko para Marvel Comics.

title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns
author: Frank Miller
description: A groundbreaking reinterpretation of Batman's origin and his return to Gotham City.

title: Watchmen
author: Alan Moore
description: A complex, multi-layered mystery adventure that redefined the superhero genre.

title: Sandman
author: Neil Gaiman
description: A dark fantasy series that follows the adventures of Dream of the Endless.

title: Saga
author: Brian K. Vaughan
description: An epic space opera/fantasy series about a family fighting to survive in a war-torn universe.

title: Y: The Last Man
author: Brian K. Vaughan
description: A post-apocalyptic science fiction series about the last surviving man on Earth.

title: The Walking Dead
author: Robert Kirkman
description: A horror series that follows survivors of a zombie apocalypse.

title: Preacher
author: Garth Ennis
description: A darkly comedic series about a preacher who gains the power to command others.

title: V for Vendetta
author: Alan Moore
description: A dystopian political thriller about a masked vigilante fighting against a totalitarian regime.

title: Maus
author: Art Spiegelman
description: A graphic novel depicting the Holocaust through the eyes of the author's father.
